OutwardImmediatePaymentsFlow.description: Fusion Global PAYplus (GPP) immediate payments product offering enables financial institutions to connect to specific clearings. It   provides financial institutions the capabilities to receive, process, and send Real-time credit transfer payments and payment related messages, while integrating with financial institution’s channels and back-office systems and adhering to the service level agreement (SLA) defined by the industry for the Real-time scheme.
